name: Shepherds Distress
description:
Mary had a few little lambs. Little did she know that one of them was a cheeky wolf in disguise!

The original fable about lying, turned into a game. And you get to play the liar!

Arrow keys to move.   Get close to a sheep and lure it to a safe place to lunch on it. Fighting system uses predictive input. When fighting animals your task is to smash Z and X at total random, avoiding any patterns. It might be easy at first but in later levels it gets really fun!
